mapper.insert: INSERT INTO happy_hand_jw(jwid, empid1, empid2, applytime, accepttime, startime, is_check) VALUES (#{jwid}, #{empid1}, #{empid2}, #{applytime}, #{accepttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_check})
mapper.select: SELECT sn.*, lemp1.cover as empid1Cover, lemp1.nickname as empid1Nickname, lemp2.cover as empid2Cover, lemp2.nickname as empid2Nickname FROM happy_hand_jw sn LEFT JOIN emp lemp1 ON lemp1.empid = sn.empid1 LEFT JOIN emp lemp2 ON lemp2.empid = sn.empid2 where sn.jwid=#{jwid}
mapper.update: UPDATE happy_hand_jw SET accepttime=#{accepttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startime=#{startime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_check=#{is_check} WHERE jwid=#{jwid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM happy_hand_jw where empid1 = #{empid1} AND empid2 = #{empid2}
